element.name: rpbody
element.sql: SELECT t.store, t.articul, t.artname, COUNT(*) chk, SUM(t.total) total, SUM(t.totaldsc) totaldsc, SUM(t.qtt) itqtt, SUM(t.tot) itemtot, SUM(t.dsc) itemdsc FROM (SELECT tis.name store, r.cash_id, r.id ch_id, ri.item articul, ri.name artname, (s.amount * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), -1, 1)) total, (s.discounts_amount * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), 1, -1)) totaldsc, SUM(ri.quantity * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), -1, 1)) qtt, SUM(ri.total * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), -1, 1)) tot, SUM(ri.discount * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), 1, -1)) dsc FROM ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_header r INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_footer f USE INDEX(date) ON f.cash_id = r.cash_id AND f.id = r.id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_pos tip ON tip.cash_id = r.cash_id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_store tis ON tip.store_id = tis.store_id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_subtotal s ON s.cash_id = r.cash_id AND s.id = r.id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_item ri ON ri.cash_id = r.cash_id AND ri.receipt_header = r.id WHERE f.result = 0 AND f.`date` >= STR_TO_DATE( :pFrom , '%Y-%m-%d') AND f.`date` < DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE( :pTo , '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND ri.item = :particle GROUP BY r.cash_id, r.id) t GROUP BY t.store, t.articul, t.artname

element.name: rptype
element.sql: SELECT tis.name store, ri.item articul, ri.name artname, tidt.name dscname, COUNT(DISTINCT CONCAT_WS('.', r.cash_id, r.id)) chk, SUM(ri.quantity * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), -1, 1)) itqtt, SUM(ri.total * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), -1, 1)) itemtot, SUM(rid.increment*ri.quantity * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), 1, -1)) itemdsc FROM ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_header r INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_footer f USE INDEX(date) ON f.cash_id = r.cash_id AND f.id = r.id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_pos tip ON tip.cash_id = r.cash_id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_store tis ON tip.store_id = tis.store_id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_item ri ON ri.cash_id = r.cash_id AND ri.receipt_header = r.id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_item_discount rid ON rid.cash_id = r.cash_id AND rid.receipt_item = ri.id AND rid.increment INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_discounts rd ON rd.cash_id = r.cash_id AND rd.receipt_header = r.id AND rd.id = rid.receipt_discount INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_discount_types tidt ON tidt.id = rd.discount_type WHERE f.result = 0 AND f.`date` >= STR_TO_DATE( :pFrom , '%Y-%m-%d') AND f.`date` < DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE( :pTo , '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND ri.item = :particle GROUP BY tis.name, ri.item, ri.name, tidt.name
